liaison.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the regular exchange of information between groups of people, especially at work, so that each group knows what the other is doing
liaison.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: close liaison between the army and police
The project has been set up in liaison with the art department.
liaison.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone whose job is to talk to different departments or groups and to tell each of them about what the others are doing
liaison.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Renee Ball, liaison to the State Parks Authority
liaison.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a secret sexual relationship between a man and a woman, especially a man and a woman who are married but not to each other
